questionsSectionTitle: What questions should the verification answer?
partialReviewWarning: Note: the reviews published in real time are partially checked by registered fact-checkers. The complete and in-depth reviews, with the Aletheia standard of fact-checking, may be accessed later on the site.
hideModalBody: Are you sure you want to hide this report? only admins can see hide personalities
unhideModalBody: Are you sure you want to unhide this report
deleteModalBody: Are you sure you want to delete this report? This action cannot be undone.
factCheckingInfoMessage: This content is currently being fact-checked by our team. The report will be available once the review process is complete.
sourcesHelperText: Add the sources used in the verification
